channel.title: Hello
channel.description:
I have recently taken much intrest in SCAR bot, A couple nights ago I was botting with WT-Fakawi's Goblin scheduler. Today I tried to login and I noticed my account was disabled. I went to the page to view offences and its got the Rule 7 blah blah stuff. Now I need advice on getting this account back. When I click "View Evidence" there is nothing there. The ban says its "Applealable" so maybe there is a chance I can get my account back.
Any advice is great.
~Polaris
PS: Thanks bob :D

item.title: Hello
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Moved. And edited your post for you

Read full topic

item.title: Hello
item.dc:creator: @g00dg0d g00dg0d
item.description:
@g00dg0d wrote:

Try posting this in the Runescape board. Lots of people there have suggestions.

Mostly people just say “I will commit suicide.” That used to work but JageX finally figured it out.
